text: Maga adaraniya mahine sampataca anekesvaravadyanna, adhalatila tithe thara kara, tyanna kaidi banava, tyanna ghera taka ani pratyeka ghatacya thikani tyancyavara tapuna basa parantu jara te tauba (ksama yacana) karuna ghetila ani nityanemane namaja padhu lagatila ani jakata ada karu lagatila tara tumhi tyanca marga soduna dya. Nihsansaya, sarvasrestha allaha mapha karanara, daya karanara ahe
